title: Win a luxury Bordeaux river cruise
text: From intimate wine tastings and informative tours to historic architecture and unforgettable scenery, APT’s luxurious eight-day Grand Bordeaux river cruise is set to be simply spectacular. The winner and their companion will travel on 8 July 2016. The prize includes flights, 20 meals, all beverages on board on the ship, excursions, tips, taxes, port charges, transfers and porterage. As one of APT’s Royal Collection river cruises, this wonderful holiday starts right on your doorstep, when a private car arrives to whisk you to the airport. Then you’ll be met in Bordeaux and escorted to your luxurious river ship. Beautiful Pont de Pierre in Bordeaux The following day you’ll cruise past sheer limestone cliffs before arriving in the medieval walled village of Cadillac. Step ashore for a guided tour or opt to explore beautifully preserved châteaux nearby. Next you’ll weave through vineyards along the Gironde estuary. In Pauillac, there’s a Signature Invitation to visit a family-owned cooperage to learn about the art of making wine barrels, followed by a wine tasting. This is far from your only chance to taste local delicacies. A day later you’ll explore the 17th-century citadel of Blaye with the option to travel to Château de Cognac for a tasting. On day five, you will arrive in Libourne, your gateway to explore Unesco World Heritage-listed Saint-Émilion to stroll picturesque cobbled streets and enjoy sparkling wine from the cellars of the 14th century Les Cordeliers. A second day in Libourne presents a choice of a tasting at a caviar estate or a visit to charming Bergerac before your Captain’s Farewell Dinner back on board. On your last full day, you will explore Bordeaux, the cultural gem of south-west France, before a final, lavish private dinner at the Château Pape Clément wine estate. Vines were planted here in the 13th century by Bertrand de Goth, who later became Pope Clement V. After breakfast the next morning, you’ll disembark and transfer to the airport for your journey home.
